title: Phishing Attacks
description: Phishing attacks involve tricking individuals into revealing confidential information via deceptive emails, websites, or phone calls.

title: Ransomware
description: Ransomware is a type of malicious software that encrypts the victim's data and demands payment for the decryption key.

title: Data Breaches
description: A data breach occurs when sensitive data is accessed or exposed by unauthorized individuals or entities.

title: Social Engineering
description: Social engineering is a manipulation tactic used to deceive individuals into divulging confidential information.
